title: Effective Instructional Design Strategies Through Matching Knowledge Structures and Pedagogical Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners engage in collaborative projects using digital tools and real-world social problem-solving initiatives.

learning_goals: Learners can classify the knowledge structure of learning objectives based on tacitness and learnability dimensions.
Learners can select and justify pedagogical methods (e.g., problem sets, service learning) appropriate for the classified knowledge structure.
Learners can apply knowledge management frameworks to design project-based learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
